Welcome to Open-GIS!


This is an open source geographic information system (GIS) comprised of the following:




GeoServer


Postgresql


GeoNode

docs.text:
QGIS and CRS






Create new QGIS Project






Settings -
 Options -
 CRS






Always start new projects with the following CRS:






EPSG:102123, NAD_1983_Michigan_GeoRef_Meters


Creating a Buffer






Right click on layer and choose Save As






Save layer using the michigan georef crs






Perform the buffer on the new layer
docs.title: Qgis crs

docs.text: Create new QGIS Project    Settings -  Options -  CRS    Always start new projects with the following CRS:    EPSG:102123, NAD_1983_Michigan_GeoRef_Meters
docs.title: QGIS and CRS

docs.text: Right click on layer and choose Save As    Save layer using the michigan georef crs    Perform the buffer on the new layer
docs.title: Creating a Buffer

docs.text:
Topo Map PDF to Tif


USTopo2GTIF


Assume MN_Grand_Marais_20160511_TM_geo.pdf is the pdf you want to add to the GIS


gdalinfo MN_Grand_Marais_20160511_TM_geo.pdf --mdd LAYERS





Use the list of layers to use in the 
GDAL_PDF_LAYERS
 command


gdal_translate MN_Grand_Marais_20160511_TM_geo.pdf marais_contours.tif \
--config GDAL_PDF_LAYERS 
Map_Frame.Terrain.Contours
 --config GDAL_PDF_BANDS 3 \
--config GDAL_PDF_DPI 400
docs.title: Topo to tif

docs.text:
USTopo2GTIF  Assume MN_Grand_Marais_20160511_TM_geo.pdf is the pdf you want to add to the GIS  gdalinfo MN_Grand_Marais_20160511_TM_geo.pdf --mdd LAYERS  Use the list of layers to use in the  GDAL_PDF_LAYERS  command  gdal_translate MN_Grand_Marais_20160511_TM_geo.pdf marais_contours.tif \
--config GDAL_PDF_LAYERS  Map_Frame.Terrain.Contours  --config GDAL_PDF_BANDS 3 \
--config GDAL_PDF_DPI 400
docs.title: Topo Map PDF to Tif
